context.p: Top Consumers query lists the largest objects grouped by class, class loader, and package. To run the query select Top Consumers in the Leak Identification category :

image.alt: screen shot of the list of biggest objects

context.p: The result of the query is displayed as HTML page. Objects are represented by hyperlinks, activating those hyperlinks you can bring up a context menu and continue the analysis of the selected object. See Pie Chart Links for links from pie charts.
